description:
This is a research code which is intended to be made available to researchers to the password-protected simtk.org
website which hosts the lung deposition simulation project "In-silico LADDER: Lung Aerosol Dosimetry for Drug and
Environmental Research" headed by NIH PI Prof. Chantal Darquenne (UCSD). Industrial applications are more accurate
deposition predictions of medical aerosols, including potentially subject-specific exposures.
Accessing the code requires registration.
name: multiBreath.py
